synopsis.text: Eagle City, Komerica -- In the bustling WNA Research Laboratory, a team of dedicated scientists, Burton, Berecca, and Ron, have been relentlessly working on a groundbreaking invention: 'Ninja-Gum'. This enigmatic substance holds the power to unlock dormant Ninja DNA in individuals who trace their lineage back to the legendary mercenary warriors of ancient times. After countless trials and tribulations, their perseverance bears fruit on their 2,503rd attempt, culminating in the successful creation of Ninja-Gum! Bursting with anticipation, Burton and Berecca eagerly seize the opportunity to test the gum on themselves. But as the excitement reaches its peak, an unexpected turn of events unfolds...
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
